title: Harmonic Dueller
content:
Harmonic Dueller Rare 2~9 Damage 1d8+1Piercing Weapon Enchantment +1 Mellow Harmony Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks: Unsheathed, the steel of this rapier shivers and thrums mellifluously in response to nearby surfaces - the motion brings to mind an actor struck with pre-show nerves. Rapier Finesse 0.9 380

Harmonic Dueller

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:
